attributes.title: All plates, cutlery, glasses and other tableware have been sanitised
Guest accommodation is disinfected between stays
Guest accomodation cleaning can be avoided on request
Hand sanitiser in guest accommodation and key areas
Linens, towels and laundry washed in accordance with local authorities guidelines
Physical distancing following guidelines from local authorities
Process in place to check health of guests
Property is cleaned by professional cleaning companies
Property removed all, or never offered, plastic bottles for non-water drinks
Property removed all, or never offered, plastic cups
Property removed all, or never offered, plastic cutlery and tableware
Property removed all, or never offered, plastic stirrers
Property removed all, or never offered, plastic straws
Property removed all, or never offered, plastic water bottles
Property removed all, or never offered, single-use plastic toiletries
Screens or physical barriers placed between staff and guests in appropriate areas
Shared stationery such as printed menus, magazines, pens, and paper removed
Staff follow all safety protocols as directed by local authorities
Thermometers for guests provided by property
Tour or class about local culture
Use of cleaning chemicals that are effective against Coronavirus
